00085 inline std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream& Str, header_param name) {
00086     switch (name) {
00087     case header_param::CHR : return Str << "CHR";
00088     case header_param::CHR_SIZE : return Str << "CHR_SIZE";
00089     default: return Str << (int) name;
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00094 inline std::string& operator<<(std::string& Str, header_param name) {
00095     switch (name) {
00096     case header_param::CHR : return Str+="CHR";
00097     case header_param::CHR_SIZE : return Str+="CHR_SIZE";
00098     default: return Str;
00099     }
00100 }
00101 
00102 inline std::istream& operator>>(std::istream &is, header_param& name) {
00103     std::string header;
00104     is >> header;
00105     if (header == "CHR") name = header_param::CHR;
00106     else if (header == "CHR_SIZE") name = header_param::CHR_SIZE;
00107     else {
00108         invalid_header_param_throw e;
00109         e << string_error(header);
00110         throw e;
00111     }
00112     return is;
00113 }
